name: div
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on all orders
Ergonomic Design: Engineered for a personalized fit & maximum protection
Gel-to-Shell® Technology: Air-activated material transforms from gel to a custom, form-fitting shield in 30 minutes
Dispersion Technology: Deflects and disperses impact across the entire guard for efficient, full-area protection
Custom Molding Gear: Gel-to-Shell® products mold specifically to the player for a one-to-one fit
Comfort Lining: Moisture-wicking interior enhances comfort during use
3D Cloud Mesh: Features a textured, raised surface for a modern, premium appearance
Small and Large Sizes: Size small for arms <10” and size large for arms >10”; measure around the bicep just above the elbow for best fit
